short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adjusts Amazon prices based on local tax rates.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have you ever felt the total price is way more than what you have put in your cart? Checky shows the final price of the product in amazon.com based on user's zip code.
